d.label: d
d.description: Format to use for retrieving the time the post was written. Accepts 'G', 'U', or php date format value specified in 'time_format' option. Default empty.

get_theme_starter_content.name: get_theme_starter_content
get_theme_starter_content.summary: Filters the expanded array of starter content.

config.label: config
config.description: Array of theme-specific starter content configuration.

get_to_ping.name: get_to_ping
get_to_ping.summary: Filters the list of URLs yet to ping for the given post.

to_ping.label: to_ping
to_ping.description: List of URLs yet to ping.

get_user_option_option.name: get_user_option_{$option}
get_user_option_option.summary: Filters a specific user option value.
get_user_option_option.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $option, refers to the user option name.

result.label: result
result.description: Value for the user's option.

option.label: option
option.description: Name of the option being retrieved.

user.label: user
user.description: WP_User object of the user whose option is being retrieved.

get_usernumposts.name: get_usernumposts
get_usernumposts.summary: Filters the number of posts a user has written.

post_type.label: post_type
post_type.description: Single post type or array of post types to count the number of posts for.

public_only.label: public_only
public_only.description: Whether to limit counted posts to public posts.

get_users_drafts.name: get_users_drafts
get_users_drafts.summary: Filters the user's drafts query string.

get_wp_title_rss.name: get_wp_title_rss
get_wp_title_rss.summary: Filters the blog title for use as the feed title.

getarchives_join.name: getarchives_join
getarchives_join.summary: Filters the SQL JOIN clause for retrieving archives.

sql_join.label: sql_join
sql_join.description: Portion of SQL query containing JOIN clause.

getarchives_where.name: getarchives_where
getarchives_where.summary: Filters the SQL WHERE clause for retrieving archives.

sql_where.label: sql_where
sql_where.description: Portion of SQL query containing the WHERE clause.

getimagesize_mimes_to_exts.name: getimagesize_mimes_to_exts
getimagesize_mimes_to_exts.summary: Filters the list mapping image mime types to their respective extensions.

mime_to_ext.label: mime_to_ext
mime_to_ext.description: Array of image mime types and their matching extensions.

domain.label: domain
domain.description: Text domain. Unique identifier for retrieving translated strings.

gettext_with_context.name: gettext_with_context
gettext_with_context.summary: Filters text with its translation based on context information.

context.label: context
context.description: Context information for the translators.

domain.label: domain
domain.description: Text domain. Unique identifier for retrieving translated strings.

global_terms_enabled.name: global_terms_enabled
global_terms_enabled.summary: Filters whether global terms are enabled.
global_terms_enabled.description: Passing a non-null value to the filter will effectively short-circuit the function, returning the value of the 'global_terms_enabled' site option instead.

got_rewrite.name: got_rewrite
got_rewrite.summary: Filters whether Apache and mod_rewrite are present.
got_rewrite.description: This filter was previously used to force URL rewriting for other servers, like nginx. Use the {@see 'got_url_rewrite'} filter in got_url_rewrite() instead.

got_rewrite.label: got_rewrite
got_rewrite.description: Whether Apache and mod_rewrite are present.

got_url_rewrite.name: got_url_rewrite
got_url_rewrite.summary: Filters whether URL rewriting is available.

handle_bulk_actions-screen.name: handle_bulk_actions-{$screen}
handle_bulk_actions-screen.summary: Fires when a custom bulk action should be handled.
handle_bulk_actions-screen.description:
The redirect link should be modified with success or failure feedback from the action to be used to display feedback to the user.

The dynamic portion of the hook name, $screen, refers to the current screen ID.

items.label: items
items.description: The items to take the action on.

handle_network_bulk_actions-screen.name: handle_network_bulk_actions-{$screen}
handle_network_bulk_actions-screen.summary: Fires when a custom bulk action should be handled.
handle_network_bulk_actions-screen.description:
The redirect link should be modified with success or failure feedback from the action to be used to display feedback to the user.

The dynamic portion of the hook name, $screen, refers to the current screen ID.

items.label: items
items.description: The items to take the action on.

has_nav_menu.name: has_nav_menu
has_nav_menu.summary: Filters whether a nav menu is assigned to the specified location.

has_nav_menu.label: has_nav_menu
has_nav_menu.description: Whether there is a menu assigned to a location.

has_post_thumbnail.name: has_post_thumbnail
has_post_thumbnail.summary: Filters whether a post has a post thumbnail.

has_thumbnail.label: has_thumbnail
has_thumbnail.description: true if the post has a post thumbnail, otherwise false.

post.label: post
post.description: Post ID or WP_Post object. Default is global $post.

thumbnail_id.label: thumbnail_id
thumbnail_id.description: Post thumbnail ID or empty string.

settings.label: settings
settings.description: An array of header video settings.

heartbeat_nopriv_received.name: heartbeat_nopriv_received
heartbeat_nopriv_received.summary: Filters Heartbeat Ajax response in no-privilege environments.

data.label: data
data.description: The $_POST data sent.

heartbeat_nopriv_send.name: heartbeat_nopriv_send
heartbeat_nopriv_send.summary: Filters Heartbeat Ajax response in no-privilege environments when no data is passed.

data.label: data
data.description: The $_POST data sent.

hidden_columns.name: hidden_columns
hidden_columns.summary: Filters the list of hidden columns.

screen.label: screen
screen.description: WP_Screen object of the current screen.

use_defaults.label: use_defaults
use_defaults.description: Whether to show the default columns.

hidden_meta_boxes.name: hidden_meta_boxes
hidden_meta_boxes.summary: Filters the list of hidden meta boxes.

hidden.label: hidden
hidden.description: An array of hidden meta boxes.

screen.label: screen
screen.description: WP_Screen object of the current screen.

use_defaults.label: use_defaults
use_defaults.description: Whether to show the default meta boxes. Default true.

url.label: url
url.description: The complete home URL including scheme and path.

path.label: path
path.description: Path relative to the home URL. Blank string if no path is specified.

orig_scheme.label: orig_scheme
orig_scheme.description: Scheme to give the home URL context. Accepts 'http', 'https', 'relative', 'rest', or null.

blog_id.label: blog_id
blog_id.description: Site ID, or null for the current site.

htmledit_pre.name: htmledit_pre
htmledit_pre.summary: Filters the text before it is formatted for the HTML editor.

http_api_transports.name: http_api_transports
http_api_transports.summary: Filters which HTTP transports are available and in what order.

transports.label: transports
transports.description: Array of HTTP transports to check. Default array contains 'curl', and 'streams', in that order.

args.label: args
args.description: HTTP request arguments.

http_headers_useragent.name: http_headers_useragent
http_headers_useragent.summary: Filters the user agent value sent with an HTTP request.

http_origin.name: http_origin
http_origin.summary: Change the origin of an HTTP request.

origin.label: origin
origin.description: The original origin for the request.

http_request_args.name: http_request_args
http_request_args.summary: Filters the arguments used in an HTTP request.

r.label: r
r.description: An array of HTTP request arguments.

http_request_host_is_external.name: http_request_host_is_external
http_request_host_is_external.summary: Check if HTTP request is external or not.
http_request_host_is_external.description: Allows to change and allow external requests for the HTTP request.

outputs.description: false Whether HTTP request is external or not.

http_request_redirection_count.name: http_request_redirection_count
http_request_redirection_count.summary: Filters the number of redirects allowed during an HTTP request.

http_request_reject_unsafe_urls.name: http_request_reject_unsafe_urls
http_request_reject_unsafe_urls.summary: Filters whether to pass URLs through wp_http_validate_url() in an HTTP request.

pass_url.label: pass_url
pass_url.description: Whether to pass URLs through wp_http_validate_url(). Default false.

http_request_timeout.name: http_request_timeout
http_request_timeout.summary: Filters the timeout value for an HTTP request.

timeout_value.label: timeout_value
timeout_value.description: Time in seconds until a request times out. Default 5.

http_request_version.name: http_request_version
http_request_version.summary: Filters the version of the HTTP protocol used in a request.

version.label: version
version.description: Version of HTTP used. Accepts '1.0' and '1.1'. Default '1.0'.

http_response.name: http_response
http_response.summary: Filters the HTTP API response immediately before the response is returned.

https_local_ssl_verify.name: https_local_ssl_verify
https_local_ssl_verify.summary: Filters whether SSL should be verified for local requests.

ssl_verify.label: ssl_verify
ssl_verify.description: Whether to verify the SSL connection. Default true.

https_ssl_verify.name: https_ssl_verify
https_ssl_verify.summary: Filters whether SSL should be verified for non-local requests.

ssl_verify.label: ssl_verify
ssl_verify.description: Whether to verify the SSL connection. Default true.

human_time_diff.name: human_time_diff
human_time_diff.summary: Filters the human readable difference between two timestamps.

since.label: since
since.description: The difference in human readable text.

from.label: from
from.description: Unix timestamp from which the difference begins.

to.label: to
to.description: Unix timestamp to end the time difference.

icon_dirs.name: icon_dirs
icon_dirs.summary: Filters the list of icon directory URIs.

iis7_supports_permalinks.name: iis7_supports_permalinks
iis7_supports_permalinks.summary: Filters whether IIS 7+ supports pretty permalinks.

supports_permalinks.label: supports_permalinks
supports_permalinks.description: Whether IIS7 supports permalinks. Default false.

iis7_url_rewrite_rules.name: iis7_url_rewrite_rules
iis7_url_rewrite_rules.summary: Filters the list of rewrite rules formatted for output to a web.config.

rules.label: rules
rules.description: Rewrite rules formatted for IIS web.config.

illegal_user_logins.name: illegal_user_logins
illegal_user_logins.summary: Filters the list of blacklisted usernames.

image_add_caption_shortcode.name: image_add_caption_shortcode
image_add_caption_shortcode.summary: Filters the image HTML markup including the caption shortcode.

shcode.label: shcode
shcode.description: The image HTML markup with caption shortcode.

image_add_caption_text.name: image_add_caption_text
image_add_caption_text.description:
Note: If the caption text is empty, the caption shortcode will not be appended to the image HTML when inserted into the editor.

Passing an empty value also prevents the {@see 'image_add_caption_shortcode'} Filters from being evaluated at the end of image_add_caption().

image_downsize.name: image_downsize
image_downsize.summary: Filters whether to preempt the output of image_downsize().
image_downsize.description: Passing a truthy value to the filter will effectively short-circuit down-sizing the image, returning that value as output instead.

downsize.label: downsize
downsize.description: Whether to short-circuit the image downsize. Default false.

size.label: size
size.description: Size of image. Image size or array of width and height values (in that order). Default 'medium'.

image_edit_before_change.name: image_edit_before_change
image_edit_before_change.summary: Filters the GD image resource before applying changes to the image.

image_editor_default_mime_type.name: image_editor_default_mime_type
image_editor_default_mime_type.summary: Filters default mime type prior to getting the file extension.

image_editor_save_pre.name: image_editor_save_pre
image_editor_save_pre.summary: Filters the WP_Image_Editor instance for the image to be streamed to the browser.

data.label: data
data.description: Array of file relative path, width, and height on success. May also include file absolute path and URL.

post_id.label: post_id
post_id.description: The post_id of the image attachment

size.label: size
size.description: Registered image size or flat array of initially-requested height and width dimensions (in that order).

image_make_intermediate_size.name: image_make_intermediate_size
image_make_intermediate_size.summary: Filters the name of the saved image file.

image_memory_limit.name: image_memory_limit
image_memory_limit.summary: Filters the memory limit allocated for image manipulation.

filtered_limit.label: filtered_limit
filtered_limit.description: Maximum memory limit to allocate for images. Default WP_MAX_MEMORY_LIMIT or the original php.ini memory_limit, whichever is higher. Accepts an integer (bytes), or a shorthand string notation, such as '256M'.

image_resize_dimensions.name: image_resize_dimensions
image_resize_dimensions.summary: Filters whether to preempt calculating the image resize dimensions.
image_resize_dimensions.description: Passing a non-null value to the filter will effectively short-circuit image_resize_dimensions(), returning that value instead.

null.label: null
null.description: Whether to preempt output of the resize dimensions.

crop.label: crop
crop.description: Whether to crop image to specified width and height or resize. An array can specify positioning of the crop area. Default false.

image_save_pre.name: image_save_pre
image_save_pre.summary: Filters the GD image resource to be streamed to the browser.

image_send_to_editor.name: image_send_to_editor
image_send_to_editor.summary: Filters the image HTML markup to send to the editor when inserting an image.

html.label: html
html.description: The image HTML markup to send.

size.label: size
size.description: Size of image. Image size or array of width and height values (in that order). Default 'medium'.

alt.label: alt
alt.description: The image alternative, or alt, text.

image_send_to_editor_url.name: image_send_to_editor_url
image_send_to_editor_url.summary: Filters the image URL sent to the editor.

html.label: html
html.description: HTML markup sent to the editor for an image.

align.label: align
align.description: The image alignment. Default 'alignnone'. Possible values include 'alignleft', 'aligncenter', 'alignright', 'alignnone'.

image_size_names_choose.name: image_size_names_choose
image_size_names_choose.summary: Filters the names and labels of the default image sizes.

size_names.label: size_names
size_names.description: Array of image sizes and their names. Default values include 'Thumbnail', 'Medium', 'Large', 'Full Size'.

image_strip_meta.name: image_strip_meta
image_strip_meta.summary: Filters whether to strip metadata from images when they're resized.
image_strip_meta.description: This filter only applies when resizing using the Imagick editor since GD always strips profiles by default.

strip_meta.label: strip_meta
strip_meta.description: Whether to strip image metadata during resizing. Default true.

img_caption_shortcode.name: img_caption_shortcode
img_caption_shortcode.summary: Filters the default caption shortcode output.
img_caption_shortcode.description: If the filtered output isn't empty, it will be used instead of generating the default caption template.

content.label: content
content.description: The image element, possibly wrapped in a hyperlink.

img_caption_shortcode_width.name: img_caption_shortcode_width
img_caption_shortcode_width.summary: Filters the width of an image's caption.
img_caption_shortcode_width.description: By default, the caption is 10 pixels greater than the width of the image, to prevent post content from running up against a floated image.

width.label: width
width.description: Width of the caption in pixels. To remove this inline style, return zero.

content.label: content
content.description: The image element, possibly wrapped in a hyperlink.

import_upload_size_limit.name: import_upload_size_limit
import_upload_size_limit.summary: Filters the maximum allowed upload size for import files.

includes_url.name: includes_url
includes_url.summary: Filters the URL to the includes directory.

url.label: url
url.description: The complete URL to the includes directory including scheme and path.

path.label: path
path.description: Path relative to the URL to the wp-includes directory. Blank string if no path is specified.

incompatible_sql_modes.name: incompatible_sql_modes
incompatible_sql_modes.summary: Filters the list of incompatible SQL modes to exclude.

insert_user_meta.name: insert_user_meta
insert_user_meta.summary: Filters a user's meta values and keys immediately after the user is created or updated and before any user meta is inserted or updated.
insert_user_meta.description: Does not include contact methods. These are added using wp_get_user_contact_methods( $user ).

meta.label: meta
meta.description:
Default meta values and keys for the user.
  • 'nickname'
    (string) The user's nickname. Default is the user's username.
  • 'first_name'
    (string) The user's first name.
  • 'last_name'
    (string) The user's last name.
  • 'description'
    (string) The user's description.
  • 'rich_editing'
    (bool) Whether to enable the rich-editor for the user. False if not empty.
  • 'syntax_highlighting'
    (bool) Whether to enable the rich code editor for the user. False if not empty.
  • 'comment_shortcuts'
    (bool) Whether to enable keyboard shortcuts for the user. Default false.
  • 'admin_color'
    (string) The color scheme for a user's admin screen. Default 'fresh'.
  • 'use_ssl'
    (int|bool) Whether to force SSL on the user's admin area. 0|false if SSL is not forced.
  • 'show_admin_bar_front'
    (bool) Whether to show the admin bar on the front end for the user. Default true.

update.label: update
update.description: Whether the user is being updated rather than created.

install_plugin_complete_actions.name: install_plugin_complete_actions
install_plugin_complete_actions.summary: Filters the list of action links available following a single plugin installation.

api.label: api
api.description: Object containing WordPress.org API plugin data. Empty for non-API installs, such as when a plugin is installed via upload.

plugin_file.label: plugin_file
plugin_file.description: Path to the plugin file relative to the plugins directory.

install_plugins_nonmenu_tabs.name: install_plugins_nonmenu_tabs
install_plugins_nonmenu_tabs.summary: Filters tabs not associated with a menu item on the Plugin Install screen.

nonmenu_tabs.label: nonmenu_tabs
nonmenu_tabs.description: The tabs that don't have a menu item on the Plugin Install screen.

install_plugins_table_api_args_tab.name: install_plugins_table_api_args_{$tab}
install_plugins_table_api_args_tab.summary: Filters API request arguments for each Plugin Install screen tab.
install_plugins_table_api_args_tab.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $tab, refers to the plugin install tabs. Default tabs include 'featured', 'popular', 'recommended', 'favorites', and 'upload'.

args.label: args
args.description: Plugin Install API arguments.

install_plugins_tabs.name: install_plugins_tabs
install_plugins_tabs.summary: Filters the tabs shown on the Plugin Install screen.

tabs.label: tabs
tabs.description: The tabs shown on the Plugin Install screen. Defaults include 'featured', 'popular', 'recommended', 'favorites', and 'upload'.

install_theme_complete_actions.name: install_theme_complete_actions
install_theme_complete_actions.summary: Filters the list of action links available following a single theme installation.

api.label: api
api.description: Object containing WordPress.org API theme data.

install_themes_nonmenu_tabs.name: install_themes_nonmenu_tabs
install_themes_nonmenu_tabs.summary: Filters tabs not associated with a menu item on the Install Themes screen.

nonmenu_tabs.label: nonmenu_tabs
nonmenu_tabs.description: The tabs that don't have a menu item on the Install Themes screen.

install_themes_table_api_args_tab.name: install_themes_table_api_args_{$tab}
install_themes_table_api_args_tab.summary: Filters API request arguments for each Install Themes screen tab.
install_themes_table_api_args_tab.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $tab, refers to the theme install tabs. Default tabs are 'dashboard', 'search', 'upload', 'featured', 'new', and 'updated'.

args.label: args
args.description: An array of themes API arguments.

install_themes_tabs.name: install_themes_tabs
install_themes_tabs.summary: Filters the tabs shown on the Add Themes screen.
install_themes_tabs.description: This filter is for backward compatibility only, for the suppression of the upload tab.

tabs.label: tabs
tabs.description: Associative array of the tabs shown on the Add Themes screen. Default is 'upload'.

intermediate_image_sizes.name: intermediate_image_sizes
intermediate_image_sizes.summary: Filters the list of intermediate image sizes.

image_sizes.label: image_sizes
image_sizes.description: An array of intermediate image sizes. Defaults are 'thumbnail', 'medium', 'medium_large', 'large'.

intermediate_image_sizes_advanced.name: intermediate_image_sizes_advanced
intermediate_image_sizes_advanced.summary: Filters the image sizes automatically generated when uploading an image.

sizes.label: sizes
sizes.description: An associative array of image sizes.

metadata.label: metadata
metadata.description: An associative array of image metadata: width, height, file.

is_active_sidebar.name: is_active_sidebar
is_active_sidebar.summary: Filters whether a dynamic sidebar is considered "active".

is_active_sidebar.label: is_active_sidebar
is_active_sidebar.description: Whether or not the sidebar should be considered "active". In other words, whether the sidebar contains any widgets.

index.label: index
index.description: Index, name, or ID of the dynamic sidebar.

is_email.name: is_email
is_email.summary: Filters whether an email address is valid.
is_email.description: This filter is evaluated under several different contexts, such as 'email_too_short', 'email_no_at', 'local_invalid_chars', 'domain_period_sequence', 'domain_period_limits', 'domain_no_periods', 'sub_hyphen_limits', 'sub_invalid_chars', or no specific context.

is_email.label: is_email
is_email.description: Whether the email address has passed the is_email() checks. Default false.

context.label: context
context.description: Context under which the email was tested.

is_email_address_unsafe.name: is_email_address_unsafe
is_email_address_unsafe.summary: Filters whether an email address is unsafe.

is_email_address_unsafe.label: is_email_address_unsafe
is_email_address_unsafe.description: Whether the email address is "unsafe". Default false.

is_header_video_active.name: is_header_video_active
is_header_video_active.summary: Modify whether the custom header video is eligible to show on the current page.

show_video.label: show_video
show_video.description: Whether the custom header video should be shown. Returns the value of the theme setting for the custom-header's video-active-callback. If no callback is set, the default value is that of is_front_page().

is_multi_author.name: is_multi_author
is_multi_author.summary: Filters whether the site has more than one author with published posts.

is_protected_meta.name: is_protected_meta
is_protected_meta.summary: Filters whether a meta key is considered protected.

protected.label: protected
protected.description: Whether the key is considered protected.

meta_type.label: meta_type
meta_type.description: Type of object metadata is for (e.g., comment, post, term, or user).

is_wide_widget_in_customizer.name: is_wide_widget_in_customizer
is_wide_widget_in_customizer.summary: Filters whether the given widget is considered "wide".

is_wide.label: is_wide
is_wide.description: Whether the widget is wide, Default false.

jpeg_quality.name: jpeg_quality
jpeg_quality.summary: Filters the JPEG compression quality for backward-compatibility.
jpeg_quality.description:
Applies only during initial editor instantiation, or when set_quality() is run manually without the $quality argument.

set_quality() has priority over the filter.

The filter is evaluated under two contexts: 'image_resize', and 'edit_image', (when a JPEG image is saved to file).

quality.label: quality
quality.description: Quality level between 0 (low) and 100 (high) of the JPEG.

context.label: context
context.description: Context of the filter.

js_escape.name: js_escape
js_escape.summary: Filters a string cleaned and escaped for output in JavaScript.
js_escape.description: Text passed to esc_js() is stripped of invalid or special characters, and properly slashed for output.

safe_text.label: safe_text
safe_text.description: The text after it has been escaped.

text.label: text
text.description: The text prior to being escaped.

kses_allowed_protocols.name: kses_allowed_protocols
kses_allowed_protocols.summary: Filters the list of protocols allowed in HTML attributes.

protocols.label: protocols
protocols.description: Array of allowed protocols e.g. 'http', 'ftp', 'tel', and more.

lang_codes.label: lang_codes
lang_codes.description: Array of key/value pairs of language codes where key is the short version.

code.label: code
code.description: A two-letter designation of the language.

language_attributes.name: language_attributes
language_attributes.summary: Filters the language attributes for display in the html tag.

output.label: output
output.description: A space-separated list of language attributes.

link_title.name: link_title
link_title.summary: Filters the OPML outline link title text.

list_cats.name: list_cats
list_cats.summary: Filters a taxonomy drop-down display element.
list_cats.description: A variety of taxonomy drop-down display elements can be modified just prior to display via this filter. Filterable arguments include 'show_option_none', 'show_option_all', and various forms of the term name.

category.label: category
category.description: The category object, or null if there's no corresponding category.

list_pages.name: list_pages
list_pages.summary: Filters the page title when creating an HTML drop-down list of pages.

list_table_primary_column.name: list_table_primary_column
list_table_primary_column.summary: Filters the name of the primary column for the current list table.

default.label: default
default.description: Column name default for the specific list table, e.g. 'name'.

context.label: context
context.description: Screen ID for specific list table, e.g. 'plugins'.

list_terms_exclusions.name: list_terms_exclusions
list_terms_exclusions.summary: Filters the terms to exclude from the terms query.

exclusions.label: exclusions
exclusions.description: NOT IN clause of the terms query.

args.label: args
args.description: An array of terms query arguments.

load_default_embeds.name: load_default_embeds
load_default_embeds.summary: Filters whether to load the default embed handlers.
load_default_embeds.description: Returning a falsey value will prevent loading the default embed handlers.

maybe_load_embeds.label: maybe_load_embeds
maybe_load_embeds.description: Whether to load the embeds library. Default true.

load_default_widgets.name: load_default_widgets
load_default_widgets.summary: Filters whether to load the Widgets library.
load_default_widgets.description: Passing a falsey value to the filter will effectively short-circuit the Widgets library from loading.

wp_maybe_load_widgets.label: wp_maybe_load_widgets
wp_maybe_load_widgets.description: Whether to load the Widgets library. Default true.

load_image_to_edit.name: load_image_to_edit
load_image_to_edit.summary: Filters the current image being loaded for editing.

size.label: size
size.description: Image size.

load_image_to_edit_attachmenturl.name: load_image_to_edit_attachmenturl
load_image_to_edit_attachmenturl.summary: Filters the image URL if not in the local filesystem.
load_image_to_edit_attachmenturl.description: The filter is only evaluated if fopen is enabled on the server.

size.label: size
size.description: Size of the image.

load_image_to_edit_filesystempath.name: load_image_to_edit_filesystempath
load_image_to_edit_filesystempath.summary: Filters the path to the current image.

manage_pages_columns.summary: Filters the columns displayed in the Pages list table.

post_columns.label: post_columns
post_columns.description: An associative array of column headings.

manage_post_type_posts_columns.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $post_type, refers to the post type slug.

post_columns.label: post_columns

manage_posts_columns.name: manage_posts_columns
manage_posts_columns.summary: Filters the columns displayed in the Posts list table.

post_columns.label: post_columns
post_columns.description: An associative array of column headings.

manage_screen-id_columns.summary: Filters the column headers for a list table on a specific screen.
manage_screen-id_columns.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $screen->id, refers to the ID of a specific screen. For example, the screen ID for the Posts list table is edit-post, so the filter for that screen would be manage_edit-post_columns.

columns.description: An array of column headers. Default empty.

manage_sites_action_links.summary: Filters the action links displayed for each site in the Sites list table.
manage_sites_action_links.description: The 'Edit', 'Dashboard', 'Delete', and 'Visit' links are displayed by default for each site. The site's status determines whether to show the 'Activate' or 'Deactivate' link, 'Unarchive' or 'Archive' links, and 'Not Spam' or 'Spam' link for each site.

actions.label: actions
actions.description: An array of action links to be displayed.

blogname.label: blogname
blogname.description: Site path, formatted depending on whether it is a sub-domain or subdirectory multisite installation.

manage_taxonomies_for_attachment_columns.name: manage_taxonomies_for_attachment_columns
manage_taxonomies_for_attachment_columns.summary: Filters the taxonomy columns for attachments in the Media list table.

taxonomies.label: taxonomies
taxonomies.description: An array of registered taxonomy names to show for attachments.

manage_taxonomies_for_post_type_columns.name: manage_taxonomies_for_{$post_type}_columns
manage_taxonomies_for_post_type_columns.summary: Filters the taxonomy columns in the Posts list table.
manage_taxonomies_for_post_type_columns.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $post_type, refers to the post type slug.

taxonomies.label: taxonomies
taxonomies.description: Array of taxonomy names to show columns for.

manage_this-screen-id_sortable_columns.summary: Filters the list table sortable columns for a specific screen.
manage_this-screen-id_sortable_columns.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $this->screen->id, refers to the ID of the current screen, usually a string.

manage_this-screen-taxonomy_custom_colum.summary: Filters the displayed columns in the terms list table.

manage_users_custom_column.name: manage_users_custom_column
manage_users_custom_column.summary: Filters the display output of custom columns in the Users list table.

map_meta_cap.summary: Filters a user's capabilities depending on specific context and/or privilege.

args.label: args
args.description: Adds the context to the cap. Typically the object ID.

max_srcset_image_width.name: max_srcset_image_width
max_srcset_image_width.summary: Filters the maximum image width to be included in a 'srcset' attribute.

max_width.label: max_width
max_width.description: The maximum image width to be included in the 'srcset'. Default '1600'.

size_array.label: size_array
size_array.description: Array of width and height values in pixels (in that order).

mce_buttons.name: mce_buttons
mce_buttons.summary: Filters the first-row list of TinyMCE buttons (Visual tab).

mce_buttons_2.name: mce_buttons_2
mce_buttons_2.summary: Filters the second-row list of TinyMCE buttons (Visual tab).

mce_buttons_3.name: mce_buttons_3
mce_buttons_3.summary: Filters the third-row list of TinyMCE buttons (Visual tab).

mce_buttons_4.name: mce_buttons_4
mce_buttons_4.summary: Filters the fourth-row list of TinyMCE buttons (Visual tab).

mce_css.name: mce_css
mce_css.summary: Filters the comma-delimited list of stylesheets to load in TinyMCE.

mce_external_languages.name: mce_external_languages
mce_external_languages.summary: Filters the translations loaded for external TinyMCE 3.x plugins.
mce_external_languages.description:
The filter takes an associative array ('plugin_name' => 'path') where 'path' is the include path to the file.

The language file should follow the same format as wp_mce_translation(), and should define a variable ($strings) that holds all translated strings.

mce_external_plugins.name: mce_external_plugins
mce_external_plugins.summary: Filters the list of TinyMCE external plugins.
mce_external_plugins.description:
The filter takes an associative array of external plugins for TinyMCE in the form 'plugin_name' => 'url'.

The url should be absolute, and should include the js filename to be loaded. For example: 'myplugin' => 'http://mysite.com/wp-content/plugins/myfolder/mce_plugin.js'.

If the external plugin adds a button, it should be added with one of the 'mce_buttons' filters.

external_plugins.label: external_plugins
external_plugins.description: An array of external TinyMCE plugins.

media_embedded_in_content_allowed_types.name: media_embedded_in_content_allowed_types
media_embedded_in_content_allowed_types.summary: Filters the embedded media types that are allowed to be returned from the content blob.

allowed_media_types.label: allowed_media_types
allowed_media_types.description: An array of allowed media types. Default media types are 'audio', 'video', 'object', 'embed', and 'iframe'.

media_library_months_with_files.name: media_library_months_with_files
media_library_months_with_files.summary: Allows overriding the list of months displayed in the media library.
media_library_months_with_files.description: By default (if this filter does not return an array), a query will be run to determine the months that have media items. This query can be expensive for large media libraries, so it may be desirable for sites to override this behavior.

outputs.description: An array of objects with month and year properties, or null (or any other non-array value) for default behavior.

media_library_show_audio_playlist.name: media_library_show_audio_playlist
media_library_show_audio_playlist.summary: Allows showing or hiding the "Create Audio Playlist" button in the media library.
media_library_show_audio_playlist.description: By default, the "Create Audio Playlist" button will always be shown in the media library. If this filter returns null, a query will be run to determine whether the media library contains any audio items. This was the default behavior prior to version 4.8.0, but this query is expensive for large media libraries.

outputs.description: Whether to show the button, or null to decide based on whether any audio files exist in the media library.

media_library_show_video_playlist.name: media_library_show_video_playlist
media_library_show_video_playlist.summary: Allows showing or hiding the "Create Video Playlist" button in the media library.
media_library_show_video_playlist.description: By default, the "Create Video Playlist" button will always be shown in the media library. If this filter returns null, a query will be run to determine whether the media library contains any video items. This was the default behavior prior to version 4.8.0, but this query is expensive for large media libraries.

outputs.description: Whether to show the button, or null to decide based on whether any video files exist in the media library.

media_dims.label: media_dims
media_dims.description: The HTML markup containing the media dimensions.

media_row_actions.name: media_row_actions
media_row_actions.summary: Filters the action links for each attachment in the Media list table.

actions.label: actions
actions.description: An array of action links for each attachment. Default 'Edit', 'Delete Permanently', 'View'.

post.label: post
post.description: WP_Post object for the current attachment.

detached.label: detached
detached.description: Whether the list table contains media not attached to any posts. Default true.

media_send_to_editor.name: media_send_to_editor
media_send_to_editor.summary: Filters the HTML markup for a media item sent to the editor.

html.label: html
html.description: HTML markup for a media item sent to the editor.

send_id.label: send_id
send_id.description: The first key from the $_POST['send'] data.

media_submitbox_misc_sections.name: media_submitbox_misc_sections
media_submitbox_misc_sections.summary: Filters the audio and video metadata fields to be shown in the publish meta box.
media_submitbox_misc_sections.description: The key for each item in the array should correspond to an attachment metadata key, and the value should be the desired label.

fields.label: fields
fields.description: An array of the attachment metadata keys and labels.

post.label: post
post.description: WP_Post object for the current attachment.

media_upload_default_tab.summary: Filters the default tab in the legacy (pre-3.5.0) media popup.

type.description: The default media popup tab. Default 'type' (From Computer).

type.description: The default media upload type. Possible values include 'image', 'audio', 'video', 'file', etc. Default 'file'.

form_action_url.label: form_action_url
form_action_url.description: The media upload form action URL.

type.label: type
type.description: The type of media. Default 'file'.

media_upload_mime_type_links.summary: Filters the media upload mime type list items.
media_upload_mime_type_links.description: Returned values should begin with an <li> tag.

type_links.label: type_links
type_links.description: An array of list items containing mime type link HTML.

media_upload_tabs.name: media_upload_tabs
media_upload_tabs.summary: Filters the available tabs in the legacy (pre-3.5.0) media popup.

menu_order.name: menu_order
menu_order.summary: Filters the order of administration menu items.
menu_order.description:
A truthy value must first be passed to the {@see 'custom_menu_order'} filter for this filter to work. Use the following to enable custom menu ordering:

add_filter( 'custom_menu_order', '__return_true' );

menu_order.label: menu_order
menu_order.description: An ordered array of menu items.

meta_query_find_compatible_table_alias.name: meta_query_find_compatible_table_alias
meta_query_find_compatible_table_alias.summary: Filters the table alias identified as compatible with the current clause.

alias.label: alias
alias.description: Table alias, or false if none was found.

mime_types.name: mime_types
mime_types.summary: Filters the list of mime types and file extensions.
mime_types.description: This filter should be used to add, not remove, mime types. To remove mime types, use the {@see 'upload_mimes'} filter.

wp_get_mime_types.label: wp_get_mime_types
wp_get_mime_types.description: Mime types keyed by the file extension regex corresponding to those types.

minimum_site_name_length.name: minimum_site_name_length
minimum_site_name_length.summary: Filters the minimum site name length required when validating a site signup.

length.label: length
length.description: The minimum site name length. Default 4.

mod_rewrite_rules.name: mod_rewrite_rules
mod_rewrite_rules.summary: Filters the list of rewrite rules formatted for output to an .htaccess file.

outputs.description: null Whether to skip the blog status check. Default null.

ms_sites_list_table_query_args.summary: Filters the arguments for the site query in the sites list table.

args.description: An array of get_sites() arguments.

ms_user_list_site_actions.summary: Filters the action links displayed next the sites a user belongs to in the Network Admin Users list table.

actions.label: actions
actions.description: An array of action links to be displayed. Default 'Edit', 'View'.

ms_user_row_actions.name: ms_user_row_actions
ms_user_row_actions.summary: Filters the action links displayed under each user in the Network Admin Users list table.

actions.label: actions
actions.description: An array of action links to be displayed. Default 'Edit', 'Delete'.

mu_dropdown_languages.name: mu_dropdown_languages
mu_dropdown_languages.summary: Filters the languages available in the dropdown.

output.label: output
output.description: Array of HTML output for the dropdown.

mu_menu_items.name: mu_menu_items
mu_menu_items.summary: Filters available network-wide administration menu options.
mu_menu_items.description:
Options returned to this filter are output as individual checkboxes that, when selected, enable site administrator access to the specified administration menu in certain contexts.

Adding options for specific menus here hinges on the appropriate checks and capabilities being in place in the site dashboard on the other side. For instance, when the single default option, 'plugins' is enabled, site administrators are granted access to the Plugins screen in their individual sites' dashboards.

admin_menus.label: admin_menus
admin_menus.description: Associative array of the menu items available.

myblogs_blog_actions.name: myblogs_blog_actions
myblogs_blog_actions.summary: Filters the row links displayed for each site on the My Sites screen.

user_blog.label: user_blog
user_blog.description: An object containing the site data.

myblogs_options.name: myblogs_options
myblogs_options.summary: Enable the Global Settings section on the My Sites screen.
myblogs_options.description: By default, the Global Settings section is hidden. Passing a non-empty string to this filter will enable the section, and allow new settings to be added, either globally or for specific sites.

settings_html.label: settings_html
settings_html.description: The settings HTML markup. Default empty.

context.label: context
context.description: Context of the setting (global or site-specific). Default 'global'.

nav_menu_attr_title.name: nav_menu_attr_title
nav_menu_attr_title.summary: Filters a navigation menu item's title attribute.

nav_menu_css_class.summary: Filters the CSS classes applied to a menu item's list item element.

classes.description: Array of the CSS classes that are applied to the menu item's <li> element.

args.label: args
args.description: An object of wp_nav_menu() arguments.

depth.label: depth
depth.description: Depth of menu item. Used for padding.

nav_menu_description.name: nav_menu_description
nav_menu_description.summary: Filters a navigation menu item's description.

nav_menu_item_args.name: nav_menu_item_args
nav_menu_item_args.summary: Filters the arguments for a single nav menu item.

args.label: args
args.description: An object of wp_nav_menu() arguments.

depth.label: depth
depth.description: Depth of menu item. Used for padding.

nav_menu_item_id.name: nav_menu_item_id
nav_menu_item_id.summary: Filters the ID applied to a menu item's list item element.

menu_id.label: menu_id
menu_id.description: The ID that is applied to the menu item's <li> element.

args.label: args
args.description: An object of wp_nav_menu() arguments.

depth.label: depth
depth.description: Depth of menu item. Used for padding.

args.label: args
args.description: An object of wp_nav_menu() arguments.

depth.label: depth
depth.description: Depth of menu item. Used for padding.

nav_menu_items_post_type_name.name: nav_menu_items_{$post_type_name}
nav_menu_items_post_type_name.summary: Filters the posts displayed in the 'View All' tab of the current post type's menu items meta box.
nav_menu_items_post_type_name.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $post_type_name, refers to the slug of the current post type.

posts.label: posts
posts.description: The posts for the current post type. Mostly WP_Post objects, but can also contain "fake" post objects to represent other menu items.

args.label: args
args.description: An array of WP_Query arguments.

post_type.label: post_type
post_type.description: The current post type object for this menu item meta box.

nav_menu_items_post_type_name_recent.name: nav_menu_items_{$post_type_name}_recent
nav_menu_items_post_type_name_recent.summary: Filters the posts displayed in the 'Most Recent' tab of the current post type's menu items meta box.
nav_menu_items_post_type_name_recent.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $post_type_name, refers to the post type name.

most_recent.label: most_recent
most_recent.description: An array of post objects being listed.

args.label: args
args.description: An array of WP_Query arguments for the meta box.

recent_args.label: recent_args
recent_args.description: An array of WP_Query arguments for 'Most Recent' tab.

nav_menu_link_attributes.name: nav_menu_link_attributes
nav_menu_link_attributes.summary: Filters the HTML attributes applied to a menu item's anchor element.

atts.label: atts
atts.description:
The HTML attributes applied to the menu item's <a> element, empty strings are ignored.
  • 'title'
    (string) Title attribute.
  • 'target'
    (string) Target attribute.
  • 'rel'
    (string) The rel attribute.
  • 'href'
    (string) The href attribute.
  • 'aria_current'
    (string) The aria-current attribute.

args.label: args
args.description: An object of wp_nav_menu() arguments.

depth.label: depth
depth.description: Depth of menu item. Used for padding.

nav_menu_meta_box_object.name: nav_menu_meta_box_object
nav_menu_meta_box_object.summary: Filters whether a menu items meta box will be added for the current object type.
nav_menu_meta_box_object.description: If a falsey value is returned instead of an object, the menu items meta box for the current meta box object will not be added.

meta_box_object.label: meta_box_object
meta_box_object.description: The current object to add a menu items meta box for.

nav_menu_submenu_css_class.name: nav_menu_submenu_css_class
nav_menu_submenu_css_class.summary: Filters the CSS class(es) applied to a menu list element.

classes.label: classes
classes.description: Array of the CSS classes that are applied to the menu <ul> element.

args.label: args
args.description: An object of wp_nav_menu() arguments.

depth.label: depth
depth.description: Depth of menu item. Used for padding.

navigation_markup_template.name: navigation_markup_template
navigation_markup_template.description:
Note: The filtered template HTML must contain specifiers for the navigation class (%1$s), the screen-reader-text value (%2$s), and placement of the navigation links (%3$s):

<nav class="navigation %1$s" role="navigation"> <h2 class="screen-reader-text">%2$s</h2> <div class="nav-links">%3$s</div> </nav>

class.label: class
class.description: The class passed by the calling function.

network_admin_email_change_email.name: network_admin_email_change_email
network_admin_email_change_email.summary: Filters the contents of the email notification sent when the network admin email address is changed.

email_change_email.label: email_change_email
email_change_email.description:
Used to build wp_mail().
  • 'to'
    (string) The intended recipient.
  • 'subject'
    (string) The subject of the email.
  • 'message'
    (string) The content of the email. The following strings have a special meaning and will get replaced dynamically: - ###OLD_EMAIL### The old network admin email address. - ###NEW_EMAIL### The new network admin email address. - ###SITENAME### The name of the network. - ###SITEURL### The URL to the site.
  • 'headers'
    (string) Headers.

old_email.label: old_email
old_email.description: The old network admin email address.

new_email.label: new_email
new_email.description: The new network admin email address.

network_admin_plugin_action_links.name: network_admin_plugin_action_links
network_admin_plugin_action_links.summary: Filters the action links displayed for each plugin in the Network Admin Plugins list table.

actions.label: actions
actions.description: An array of plugin action links. By default this can include 'activate', 'deactivate', and 'delete'.

plugin_file.label: plugin_file
plugin_file.description: Path to the plugin file relative to the plugins directory.

plugin_data.label: plugin_data
plugin_data.description: An array of plugin data. See get_plugin_data().

context.label: context
context.description: The plugin context. By default this can include 'all', 'active', 'inactive', 'recently_activated', 'upgrade', 'mustuse', 'dropins', and 'search'.

network_admin_plugin_action_links_plugin.name: network_admin_plugin_action_links_{$plugin_file}
network_admin_plugin_action_links_plugin.summary: Filters the list of action links displayed for a specific plugin in the Network Admin Plugins list table.
network_admin_plugin_action_links_plugin.description: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $plugin_file, refers to the path to the plugin file, relative to the plugins directory.

actions.label: actions
actions.description: An array of plugin action links. By default this can include 'activate', 'deactivate', and 'delete'.

plugin_file.label: plugin_file
plugin_file.description: Path to the plugin file relative to the plugins directory.

plugin_data.label: plugin_data
plugin_data.description: An array of plugin data. See get_plugin_data().

context.label: context

oembed_providers.name: oembed_providers
oembed_providers.summary: Filters the list of whitelisted oEmbed providers.
oembed_providers.description:
Since WordPress 4.4, oEmbed discovery is enabled for all users and allows embedding of sanitized iframes. The providers in this list are whitelisted, meaning they are trusted and allowed to embed any content, such as iframes, videos, JavaScript, and arbitrary HTML.

Supported providers:

pass_change_email.label: pass_change_email
pass_change_email.description:
Used to build wp_mail().
  • 'to'
    (string) The intended recipients. Add emails in a comma separated string.
  • 'subject'
    (string) The subject of the email.
  • 'message'
    (string) The content of the email. The following strings have a special meaning and will get replaced dynamically: - ###USERNAME### The current user's username. - ###ADMIN_EMAIL### The admin email in case this was unexpected. - ###EMAIL### The user's email address. - ###SITENAME### The name of the site. - ###SITEURL### The URL to the site.
  • 'headers'
    (string) Headers. Add headers in a newline (rn) separated string.
